resources.string: Your device don\'t have NFC support. You can\'t use your device with this application.
NFC is disabled. Please enable NFC in system preferences.
Please scan the NFC tag you want to associate with a piece of Art.
The TAG you scanned is already associate to an Art in the app \"ProjectMuseum\"
What do you want to do ?
Associate this Tag to an Art
Select the new Art associated to this TAG
Select the Art you want to associate to this TAG
App Directory does not exist. It will be created after you click on \"Close App\" button.
You must add ressources in the App directory before use this application.
